channel.title: fullstak on Peter's Notebook

item.title: GoGS on a Pi3 (via Docker)
item.description: I’ve been assembling a “full stack”1 for development that runs on my Pi3. This is all happening inside of Docker containers which made cleanup redonkulously easy. Today I was looking at a source code management system; something of a “my own GitHub” which I can run on my own network.
